text: Murupi linearis is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Murupi. It was described by Martins and Galileo in 1998.Biolib.cz - Murupi linearis. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1998 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Murupi
